alert.note: Alert for Jefferson (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 28 at 6:56PM EST until November 29 at 12:00PM EST by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM TO NOON EST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Lake effect snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 7 inches south of Watertown and 2 to 4 inches in Watertown and areas north in the most persistent lake snows. * WHERE...Jefferson county. * WHEN...From 4 AM to noon EST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Most of the snowfall will occur during the Wednesday morning commute.
info.instruction: Lake effect snow will fall in relatively narrow bands. If traveling, be prepared for rapidly changing road conditions and visibilities. Submit snow reports through our website or social media.
